title: urchin prime: worktree-aware context generator
description: Build a CLI tool that generates focused context for Claude Code sessions based on current worktree, bd state, and project context. Inspired by gastown's gt prime.

title: Implement WorktreeInfo type and git detection
description: Create Tidepool/BD/Prime/Worktree.hs with WorktreeInfo type and detectWorktree function that parses 'git worktree list' output

title: Implement PrimeContext and context gathering
description: Create Tidepool/BD/Prime.hs with PrimeContext type, gatherContext function (queries bd for in-progress/ready/hooked beads), and renderPrime for markdown output

title: Add 'prime' subcommand to urchin CLI
description: Update bd-executor/app/Main.hs to add 'prime' subcommand with --worktree, --format, --epic options

title: Write tests for urchin prime
description: Unit tests for detectWorktree with mocked git output, integration test in actual worktree, golden tests for markdown output format

title: ClaudeCode graph integration
description: Integrate ClaudeCode annotation with graph execution. Enables LLM nodes to spawn Claude Code sessions via zellij-cc instead of API calls.

title: Add Backend + ClaudeCode annotations
description: Add type-level annotations for Backend selection (CloudflareAI | NativeAnthropic) and ClaudeCode node annotation (model + cwd). PR #123.

title: Implement ClaudeCode executor
description: Executor that renders template, spawns Claude Code via zellij-cc, parses JSON output. Runs in native-server worktree.

title: Build dev workflow graph in urchin
description: Create the first dev workflow graph in ~/dev/urchin that uses BD reads/writes + Haskell logic + ClaudeCode invocation for a local helper.
